oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present experimental results on the fabrication and characterization of vertical Si tunneling field-effect transistors (TFETs) in a device geometry with tunneling in line with the gate field. Compared to vertical Si TFETs without this geometry modification, on-currents are increased by more than one order of magnitude with I-ON = 1.1 mu A/mu m at V-DS = 0.5 V and an I-ON/I-OFF ratio of 3.4.10(4) in n-channel operation. We present further suggestions for device improvements.
